text.div:
Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
Fri An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Mon An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Prefend An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutesadded v2.3
Prefstart An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.In component 2, specify any valid time in the format HHMM, using 24-hour clock notation where HH = hour and MM = minutesadded v2.3
Sat An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Sun An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Thu An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Tue An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3
Wed An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.In component 2, specify OK or NO. OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferredadded v2.3

name: v2.0294
title: v2 Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0294 ( Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes)
